title: Natural Energy Supplements - Herbalogic Peak Power Herb Drops

cleaned_text: Natural Energy, Physical Performance & Stamina* Peak Power Is a Stimulant-Free, Natural, Energy Formula That Contains Powerful Herbs to Support Greater Oxygen Uptake, Enhance Physical Stamina, and Combat Adrenal Fatigue & Generalized Weariness.* Combat Adrenal Fatigue & Generalized Weariness* Overcome Exhaustion & Promote Higher Levels of Sustained Energy* Stimulant-Free Herbal Formula for Natural Energy, Physical Performance & Stamina* Combat Adrenal Fatigue & Generalized Weariness* Overcome Exhaustion & Promote Higher Levels of Sustained Energy* Reviews Herbal treatments to improve stamina and energy have been used traditionally for centuries. Peak Power Herb Drops combines two traditional plant-based formulas to encourage improved digestion and stronger red blood cells to improve overall body function and stamina.* Peak Power Herb Drops contain herbs extracted in alcohol and water. For those with alcohol or taste sensitivities, consider [Peak Power K2 Herb Capsules](https://www.herbalogic.com/products/peak-power-k2-capsules). When To Use Make Peak Power Herb Drops part of your daily supplement routine to support healthy body functions, increase physical stamina and overall vitality. Ingredients Proprietary Herbal Blend: Other water, [ethyl alcohol](https://www.herbalogic.com/blogs/herbiage/high-from-too-much-alcohol) from sugarcane (less than 17% by packaged volume), USP pharmaceutical grade vegetable glycerin Instructions Recommended Use: Shake well and take 20 drops (1 mL) or half a dropper full per 50 pounds of body weight by mouth two to three times per day, or as directed by your healthcare professional. If taste is too strong, dilute first in a small amount of room temperature water or other liquid. For those sensitive to alcohol, place drops in boiling water and allow to cool; most of the alcohol will evaporate. Alternate Uses: If results are not achieved at the recommended serving size, increase the frequency of use to a maximum of four times per day before increasing the serving size. Do not exceed 40 drops (2 mL) per 50 pounds of body weight for adults and 20 drops (1 mL) per 50 pounds for children under 12. Cautions While generally considered a safe, gentle herbal formula, pregnant or nursing women, or children under age six, should consult with a healthcare provider prior to using Peak Power Herbs Drops.
